title: Integer Overflow
snippet: Hey Guys,Let’s talk about Integer overflow!Overflow is nothing but the accesive flow. Consider an empty glass. If you feel it with the liquid, it will start filling (it sounds stupid). After some point, the glass will be full and the liquid will be all over the floor. That is liquid overflow wher...

title: Introduction To Binary Exploitation
snippet: Hey Guys,Let’s get started with binary exploitation!What is binary exploitation?Binary exploitation is the process of subverting a compiled application such that it violates some trust boundary in a way that is advantageous to you, the attacker. snippet: Hey Guys,Let’s start with some basics.Binary exploitation and reverse engineering might sound confusing sometimes. Consider you have a Milkshake and you have to identify the ingredients. title: Welcome
